sense.def:
To visit someone
pomeni iti k nekomu, da ga vidimo in z njim preživimo nekaj časa.

seg.quote: She visited some of her relatives for a few days.
You might need to visit a solicitor.
My aunt and uncle did visit once.
It would be nice if you paid me a visit.

sense.def:
To visit a place
pomeni iti nekam in si tisti kraj ogledati.

seg.quote: This is the best museum we've visited.
‘Do you live here?’—‘No, we're just visiting.’
